pnp:Provisioning.Author: SharePoint PnP
pnp:Provisioning.Description: SharePoint Starter Kit for SharePoint Online

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
BREATHTAKING VIDEOS & PHOTOS

Contoso MARK8 is the first drone to offer an 8K HDR camera that tilts vertically at and angle of 180°, combined with an up to 2.8X lossless zoom and dolly zoom effect. 

–

2.8X FULL HD ZOOM
Reveal your inner filmmaker

FLYING IS A BREEZE

The easy-to-operate MARK8 is designed for high-quality aerial photography and cinematography. Fly, capture and share photos and videos directly from the mobile app. 

–

8K HDR VIDEOS AND 21MP PHOTOS
Perfection is in the details

SMART & POWERFUL

Equipped with a smart battery that lasts up to 45 minutes and resists extreme temperatures the high-performance and super quiet drone you can take anywhere.

–

SLOW MOTION & HYPERLAPSE
Speed it up or slow it down, take control of time

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Meeting on Marketing In Non-English-Speaking Markets This Friday

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Please attend this department-wide meeting next Thursday at 4:00PM in conference room seven. We will be discussing tactics on how to effectively create marketing campaigns in our new international markets.

There is a lunch for the Marketing team Next Tuesday at 12:30PM. All Marketing team members should attend, as we will be talking about some of the new projects that we hope to put through for the holiday season.
We will be releasing a new international marketing campaign in the coming weeks. Look for more details here.​
We are happy to announce availability of this new Intranet portal. Please do give us feedback!

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Site Assets
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use this library to store files which are included on pages within this site, such as images on Wiki pages.
